item.title: AB-6 South - Border Crossing Information
item.description: AB-6 South hours for the border crossing into the United States. U.S.A. Port of Entry - Chief Mountain open 7AM to 10PM.

item.title: AB-6 North at AB-5 - Waterton National Park
item.description: AB-6 North at AB-5 in Waterton National Park. Turn right for AB-5 north; left for AB-6 north/AB-5 south. The directional banners on the shields are bi-lingual.

item.title: AB-5 North/AB-6 South at AB-5/AB-6 Split
item.description: AB-5 North/AB-6 South at AB-5/AB-6 split in Waterton Park. Turn right for AB-6 south; continue straight for AB-5 north.

item.title: AB-6 South Approaching AB-5 - Waterton Lakes National Park
item.description: AB-6 South approaching AB-5 in Waterton Lakes National Park. Turn right for AB-5 south to Waterton Village; straight for AB-6 South/AB-5 North to Cardston and the U.S.A. Border.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-505
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-505 east to Hill Spring and Glenwood. Continue south on AB-6 south for Waterton Park.

item.title: AB-6 South Approaching AB-505
item.description: AB-6 South Approaching AB-505 in the Municipal District Of Pincher Creek No. 9.

item.title: AB-6 South - To Waterton Park
item.description: AB-6 South - Continue ahead for Waterton Park.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-507 - Pincher Creek
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-507 East in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout - Pincher Creek
item.description: AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout in Pincher Creek. Merge right for AB-6 South.

item.title: Heweston Ave. North at AB-6/AB-507 Roundabout
item.description: Heweston Ave. North at AB-6/AB-507 roundabout in Pincher Creek. Use AB-6 North for AB-3 (Crowsnest Highway); use AB-6 south for Waterton Park; use AB-507 West for Beaver Mines and Castle Mountain.

item.title: Heweston Ave. North Approaching AB-6/AB-507
item.description: Heweston Ave. North Approaching AB-6/AB-507 roundabout in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-6 South at AB-507 Junction
item.description: AB-6 South at AB-507 West Junction in a roundabout. Merge right for AB-507 west.

item.title: AB-6 South - Pincher Creek
item.description: AB-6 south shield in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-3 East at AB-6 South
item.description: AB-3 East at AB-6 South in Pincher Creek.

item.title: AB-3 East Approaching AB-6 South
item.description: AB-3 East Approaching AB-6 South to Pincher Creek and Waterton Park. Continue east on AB-3 for Fort Macleod.

item.title: AB-3 East at AB-6 Jct.
item.description: AB-3 east (Crowsnest Highway) at AB-6 south.

item.title: AB-6 South AB-507Jct
item.description: AB-6 South entering Pincher Creek, and ABS-507 junction to Waterton Park

item.title: End AB-6 North At AB-3
item.description: AB-6 north at AB-3 to Crowsnest Pass and Fort Macleod

item.title: End AB-6 North at AB-3 Jct.
